text: Sauli Pälli (23 September 1912 - 13 December 1960) was a Finnish ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Finnish male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Finland Category:Ski jumpers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:People from Kotka
title: Sauli Pälli
